values: All I have to say is that DELAWARE is in 2 DAYS BITCHES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Well it has been quite sometime since I last updated...Tonight is the first night I will be able to spend in my bed. Its been a month and it feels so weird to be back upstairs. In 33 days I will in a car on my way to Deleware with my ladies and I can not wait another minute. I have been waiting for this all year long. I miss hanging out with everyone I cant wait to get out of this house! Wooo...! My girlie Kaitlin got her license props to her! Prom was on saturday and I had lots of fun even though I could not dance..oh well..still felt nice to be out. Regents are killing me..I can not take them anymore! Last one is on Thursday thank goodness..then comes senior year..Oh man scary thing to think about. Well im pretty excited because my cousin from Scottland is coming and hes always a blast to be with so it should be fun to have him around.Arite enought blabbing..Peace out and everyone have a great summer.

Your Birthdate: September 12
Being born on the 12th day of the month (3 energy) is likely to add a good bit of vitality to your life. The energy of 3 allows you bounce back rapidly from setbacks, physical or mental. There is a restlessness in your nature, but you seem to be able to portray an easygoing, sometimes "couldn't care less" attitude. You have a natural ability to express yourself in public, and you always make a very good impression. Good with words, you excel in writing, speaking, and possibly singing. You are energetic and always a good conversationalist. You have a keen imagination, but you tend to scatter your energies and become involved with too may superficial matters. Your mind is practical and rational despite this tendency to jump about. You are affectionate and loving - but very sensitive. You are subject to rapid ups and downs.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

Itssssss Erikaaaaaa's BIRTHDAY TODAY BITCHES!!!!

WooooooHoooooo!!!

I just have somethings to say... I LOVE MY FRIENDS!!!!!!!!!!! and I love my new carrrrrr her name is Lucielle! andddddddddddd ERIKAS BIRTHDAY IS ON FRIDAY BITCHES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


-ill give a better entry some other day...right now YAAAAAAAAY-

Well its been a little while since I last updated..Havent really felt the need to.Im sick which sucks but I've had a lot of time to think. A lot of things has happend, within in my family and other things. I dont know where am I going with this...Lately, ive been lost I guess you can say.  Its kind of scary to think that in a year I will be saying goodbye to all of my friends and  moving on to college. Who knows where i'll be, who knows where they will be. It breaks my heart to even think about leaving my friends. Netherless my family.
    Empty, thats how I feel. I can have all the love in the world from my friends and family but I still feel empty. Maybe its from what I have experienced 4 years ago. Wow...4 years, I sure do miss him. I sometimes want to give up, I just want him to walk through my door and just give me a hug and tell me everythings okay..that hes home and is never going to leave. You cant always get what you want right? I guess this is something I wont get. Until we meet again I will have this emptiness inside of me. I sometimes want to pack up everything and leave because this place reminds me too much of him. I see his face everywhere and just makes me want him home more.
    I want to be happy..but something is wrong with me..I find something that makes me happy but still I cant be the way I used to be. I want to change but I cant or is it I just dont want to? I dont know, honestly I dont know anymore. My mind is something else let me tell you. I just want to figure out whats wrong with me so I can move on and go on with life. Not have to worry about anything. Thats why sometimes I want to leave, move to Spain and just forget about my past. But my past has so many great memories, minus the grey areas that I really cant remember and choose not to. Anyways, Im about to pass out. Bye.

P.S. This is to everyone who has supported me through out the toughest years of my life. Everytime I look at myself and they way Ive turned out I thank God that I have friends like you. I honestly couldnt hve dont it without you guys. I love you so much.

Hmm today I learned how to parallel park with my sister which was lots of fun..Almost ran over my sister but thats okay Hehehe I am so stressed out with everything, I sometimes think that its unhealthy to be this way. I cant sleep at night, I cry constanly..although I hide it when I am around people..Its just when I am alone I cant stop crying. Im so unhappy right now, when I should be...I guess...I dont know..Whatever life has its ups and downs...right now im going through the downs, hopefully this will be over soon and I can be happy again..:-/...Peace out

Soooooooooooooooooooo I am really bored....I dont know what to say right now, or how to feel. Should I be crying?Should I be happy? Should I just show no emotions? Things have been really weird lately but then again I jsut see this a phase that all teenagers go through, where nothing really makes sense and you're lost. Thats where I stand right now...I need someone or something to pull me out of this confusion. Arite well I need to go and do homework. Got to keep my grades up so I can get into college hehe...

Aloha!!!!

Well, I just got back from vacation yesturday. Thank goodness we beat the storm and didnt have to stay an extra day, I mean it would have been nice to stay but I needed to come back home.Tortola(if any of you dont know where that is, its in the British Virgin Islands) was amazing, our hotel room was right on the beach, very relaxing. I truely needed to get away for a week. I had a lot of time to think things through with everything that is going on in my life. I realized that things happen for a reason, and if it is meant to the be that way then it is. There is no erasing the past and there is no turning back time to fix things. We do certain things for a reason, that reason will lead us to many different things that will be good for us in the end. I used to hang onto things that I wished would never change or leave, but I feel that it is time to let things go. There is this saying" If you truely love something let it go, and if  it comes back its yours and if it doesnt then it never was". I finally understand the true meaning to that. If something is meant to happen a certain way then I have to let it happen, I cant do anything to change fate. I dont know where I am going with this.I guess all this comes from reading the book The Notebook. I read it over vacation and it has opened my eyes to a lot of different things. I feel rejuvenated after this getaway.Arite well I am going to go before I get all emotional. Peace out cub scouts=)

I am the happiest person to be leaving tomorrow.I cant wait to be on the beach and not think about anything except me, the sand and the water.Im going to miss my friends although they are already away..anywho..I got to finish packing and such so I'll leave everyone with a big hug and kiss!!!

Love Always,
                   Adriana

><See you in a week!!!!><
Arite well I have nothing to say except that I leave on Monday..Peace Out...

Well...Its been a interesting couple of days...Friday I went to Kaits..had a blast(like always),shared some laughs..Good times..and then Saturday the girls came over and we watched The Notebook and cried our eyes out. I was miserable becuase I want to be like the couple in the movie. It was just so moving, and everytime I think about it I start to cry..Hmm Sunday my mom came home from not being home for the longest time..and now we are planning to go St.Thomas next week on a mother-daughter bonding trip. We havent had one in a long time so it will be nice to do that, and to get away from the cold!Anyways..I hope everyone Valentines Day was grand..Mine was okaay..My family had a traditional Spanish evening, It was so nice..We danced to salsa music and ate really good food..I know the dancing sounds kind of dorky but its a spanish thing lol. I really want to get in touch with my Latin roots. I would actually like to spend 3 weeks with my cousin in Spain, so I can get a taste of the culture..Last time I was in Spain I was 10 so I couldnt really absorb the culture. But anywho..I am waiting for Lena to get home so we can go get some smoothies..Yummmmyy..Arite well..Peace out

Love Always,
                Adriana

We drive tonight,
and you are by my side.
We're talking about our lives,
like we've known each other forever.
the time flies by,
with the sound of your voice.
its close to paradise,
with the end surely near.
and if i could only stop the car
and hold onto you,
and never let go...
i'll never let go.
as we round the corner
to your house
you turned to me and said,
"i'll be going through withdrawl of you for this one night we have spent."
and, i want to speak these words
but i guess i'll just bite my tongue,
and accept "someday, somehow"
as the words that we'll hang from.

and i... i don't want to speak these words.
cause i, i don't want to make things any worse.

and i... i don't want to speak these words.
cause i, i don't want to make things any worse.

why does tonite, have to end?
why don't we hit restart,
and pause it at our favorite parts.
we'll skip the goodbyes.
if i had it my way,
i'd turn the car around and runaway,
just you and i.

and i... i don't want to speak these words.
cause i, i don't want to make things any worse.

and i... i don't want to speak these words.
cause i, i don't want to make things
and i...i dont wanna make things any worse

2nd entry of the day but I wrote a poem..Not really good but whatever..Here it goes...

This feeling is taking over body

The chills crawl down my spin to my toes
My lips quiver when your hand touches my face

This feeling is taking over my soul

My heart beats faster as you walk through those doors
My heart no longer cries at the midnight moon,
because you are here with me now
My heart can finally feel after being so numb for so long

This feeling is taking over my mind

Un describable thoughts of you linger in my head
Endless feelings of not being a lone weave in and out

This feeling is taking over my body,mind, and soul.

{Horrible I know but I needed to get some feelings out}

Grandma arrived today from Venezuela so Im really happy. I love having my grandma because she makes really good food and she just loves me..Hmm I have a stupid monologue due on wednesday and I have the worst stage fright..greaattt...Anyways sitting here doing some homework..Oddd I know.Ive had a lot of time to think about everything..Yea everything doesnt go the way I planned it..but I believe in fate and I believe that things happen for a reason. If its not meant to be then its not. I guess I will have to deal with that sooner or later. Today we had a discussion of fate in English, and I truely believe in it. Maybe not everything it fate but I believe that life is sort of planned out. Somethings fail for a reason maybe to make you stronger or make you take a follow a different path. I have failed at somethings and it has led me to a different path. I just hope that the path I take is the right one. Ive been lost lately with everything that is going on my in my life. I dont know if what I am doing is the right thing, I just wish someone could come up to me and tell me that what Im doing is the wrong thing that I am supposed to be doing something completely different. I dont know where I am going with this just that I am lost within all of my thoughts. Do YOU believe in fate?If so why? if not why?...I think its a good question to ask someone. Its a crazy thing to think about if you ask me..I mean if your life is planned out..Why worry? Yet still as a society we worry about what we are doing..but if we believe in fate..Why worry? I dont get it.. I worry, I worry all the time. I try not to but I cant help it. I think this is why I have so much  anxiety. I worry way tooo much. As people would call me..A worry wart..Uggh I dont know what to do with all the situations I am in..I feel like some of them arent supposed to be there but if I believe in fate why should I even worry about it..Its meant to be there...right? or can I change it..can I change fate..Is that allowed?..

Question to everyone..I dont care who you are..Do you believe in fate?

LETS GO PATRIOTS!!!!

Ugggh just having a crappy day..Ive been having them lately, dont know why. Anyways, I sit here, alone, doing nothing.I just sit and stare at the screen until the clock turns 9 then im off...Blaaah I jsut want summer to come so I can go away and walk on the beach and pretend to surf.  Which by the way reminds me, I would like to try something new this year, like starting getting intouch with my Spanish roots and start Flamenco dancing, or salsa something..If anyone is intrested on taking lessons do tell me because I would love to. Well break was lovely..My brother came home for christmas which was the best gift ever. Really didnt do much this break which was nice..I needed some time to rest and just hang out with my brother..Had a bonding expericence with him which i really needed. Hmmm hung out with Kaitlin a lot too..Went to a John Mayer show in the city..It wasnt what I expected..he played a lot of jazz and blues music..and one of his songs but I still loved it because I got to stare at him, I never thought he was good looking until I saw him up close hehe...Then comes New Years..which was spent with my lovely friends and I was really happy because my friend Krista joined us and it was really nice because I rarely see her..We had our own Times Square Ball, which we do every year and bang pots and pans and be the crazy spanish people that we are.Im pretty excited because I leave for Wyoming in 3 days..You are probably thinking well why is she going there...Skiing!!! Woooo..I just might kill myself though because I am not the best skiier.hahah this should be interesting!!!!!!=)
    Lifes been going pretty good I guess. I realzied that I need to get myself together and start doing good in school so I can get into college..College..Boy is that a scary thought..Although I still need to go through my senior year im still scared to go. I think I might just want to move to Spain and never go to college and live on a beach with my spanish cabana boy. That would be the life and just do nothing..Oh wait i do that already..I jsut dont have a spanish cabana boy..This is pretty much the longest entry ive done but I needed to get somethings out.. I shall continue....I was watching Extreme Home Makeovers and I thank God that he has blessed me with a home that is livable and a family who loves me. I have learned not to take things for granted and accept what I have..Yeah I might want the fancy clothes and expensive things, lavish vacations but I just have to wait and maybe I will get it. And with My friends..I am so blessed to have them in my life( you know who you are)..I thank God each and every day for giving me friends like you guys. I honestly dont know what I would do without you..You guys have helped me through the toughest years in my life and I dont think I would be the same without you guys..I think the best way I could say this is..Thank you and I love you guys so much.Alrite well enough blabbing Im got to set things up for tomorrow and for WEDNESDAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
